description.left: Indicate the diagnosis event in the clinical timeline that this biospecimen acquisition was related to
description.right: Indicate the diagnosis event in the clinical timeline that this biospecimen acquisition was related to.

description.left: ICD-10 code and term used to define a condtion

examples.left: C41.1: Malignant neoplasms of mandible, C16.9: Malignant neoplasm of stomach, unspecified

notes.left: Write code and full term used in ICD-10 separated by a (:). For WHO ICD-10 codes, refer to https://apps.who.int/classifications/apps/icd/ClassificationDownload/DLArea/Download.aspx

diagnosis_ICD_code.name: diagnosis_ICD_code
diagnosis_ICD_code.description: ICD-10 code used to define condtion

meta.notes: For WHO ICD-10 codes, refer to https://apps.who.int/classifications/apps/icd/ClassificationDownload/DLArea/Download.aspx

diagnosis_source_text.name: diagnosis_source_text
diagnosis_source_text.description: Condition as reported in the study's dataset

meta.notes: Provide exact information as per the dataset if coding to ICD-10 or MONDO ontologies is not possible

diagnosis_mondo_term.name: diagnosis_mondo_term
diagnosis_mondo_term.description: Mondo code and term used to define a condtion

meta.examples: MONDO_0002131: jaw cancer, MONDO_0001056: gastric cancer
meta.notes: Write code and full term used in MONDO separated by a (:). For MONDO codes, refer to https://www.ebi.ac.uk/ols/ontologies/mondo
